snippet.title: 'Star Trek: Legends' RPG Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Today, you’ll see the past, present and future collide and distort in Star Trek: Legends, a new RPG rooted in exploration and meaningful choices, now available exclusively on Apple Arcade℠. Published by Tilting Point in partnership with ViacomCBS, Star Trek: Legends features a brand-new storyline from comic book author and Star Trek writer, Mike Johnson, as well as characters from the entire Star Trek franchise, including the Original Series, The Next Generation, Deep Space Nine, Voyager, Enterprise, Discovery and Picard. Developed by Emerald City Games, Star Trek: Legends is available to Apple Arcade subscribers across all iOS platforms, including iPhone®, iPad®, Mac® and Apple TV®. 

Star Trek: Legends lets players command the Starfleet ship U.S.S. Artemis and warp into the mysterious Nexus, a dimension where they will discover new worlds and characters from across all the various Star Trek series. When things go awry inside the Nexus, players and their crew must investigate and prevent a crisis.
